related_repositories.name: monorepo
related_repositories.description: Shared packages, SDKs, e2e tests, backend services for Nocturne

related_repositories.name: snap
related_repositories.description: Metamask snap to interact with the Nocturne protocol

cryptographic_libraries: circomlibjs (Javascript library to work with circomlib circuits)
ethers.js (Complete Ethereum library and wallet implementation)

stealth_address_details.canonical_address: Baby Jubjub curve element C = vk × G
stealth_address_details.generation: Any pair of Baby Jubjub points (H1, H2) satisfying vk × H1 = H2
stealth_address_details.randomization: Sample random scalar s, compute S' = (s × H1, s × H2)
stealth_address_details.unlinkability: Multiple stealth addresses cannot be linked without viewing key

architecture_components: Deposit Manager (asset entry with compliance screening)
key_features: Multiple unlinkable stealth addresses per user
research_notes: Night Protocol appears to be the branding/marketing name for Nocturne Protocol
Nocturne (French: night) is the technical implementation name
Multiple sources confirm Nocturne uses stealth addresses as core privacy mechanism
All data sourced from official GitHub repositories and documentation
Repository has 81 stars and 64 forks indicating active development
No separate 'Night Protocol' GitHub repository found - likely refers to Nocturne
Alternative possibility: night.finance website exists but no public GitHub found

alternative_findings.note: There is a night.finance website that mentions stealth addresses, but no public GitHub repository was found. Nocturne Protocol is the most likely match for 'Night Protocol' stealth address implementation.
